Sergeant Heath was a soldier of the Neverwinter Guard stationed at Helms Hold for a time during the late 15 century DR. He served under Dunfield, a mercenary captain that led the operations during the occupation of Helms Hold.
Sergeant Heath fought in the reclamation of Helms Hold in the , following its occupation by devil-worshiping Ashmadai forces. He worked with fellow guardsmen to rescue Lieutenant Nessfettle and her squad, after being forced to barricade themselves in a building to stay safe from the fiends that roamed the citys streets.
